text_block_list.text: Summer training camp is held for the sake of improving the abilities of Uma Musume. Silence Suzuka is also working hard with the same goal in mind.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: There's only a few days left of training camp…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It's unfortunate that we'll be leaving such a great place to focus on training.
choice_data_list: Let's spend the remaining days with no regrets

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, of course.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… speaking of which, Trainer-san. About the triathalon competition…
Silence Suzuka is talking about a Triathalon that is held as part of the summer training camp.
A triathalon consists of swimming, bicycling and a long-distance run at the end. It's something that requires quite a bit of stamina.
choice_data_list: I thought you weren't going to participate.
I thought you weren't going to participate.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes… my specialty is medium distance, and the only thing I can do is "escape" so I didn't think I was suited for it…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer-san. Would it be fine for me to enter?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: For the sake of having no regrets… I'd like to give it a try.
choice_data_list: In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.
In that case, I'll support you to the best of my abilities.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, please. I'll also run to the best of my abilities.
And so, Silence Suzuka's participation in the Triathalon was decided. Then, the day of the race-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: There are quite a few participants… I wonder if a lot of them are doing this as part of training…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …but, I'm the same. From start to finish, I'll just run at my own pace.
choice_data_list: Are you going to try something other than escape?
Are you going to try something other than escape?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, I will run in the only way I can.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer-san. …will you listen to a request?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: -A reward. I'd like you to prepare one and wait for me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, that's right… Since there's going to be a Summer Festival tonight, how about accompanying me…?
choice_data_list: I'll treat you at a food stall

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Then… I'll be off.
And so, at last, the Triathalon started.

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: First up, it's swimming in the open ocean! It may look calm, but swimming against the waves is a daunting endeavor!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Oh, the one that pulls ahead here is Silence Suzuka-san! Whether it's on the turf, or in the ocean, she won't give up the lead!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-senpai is awesome!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: But this is a Triathalon though. If she takes off like that at the start, she won't last until the end.
Despite those concerns, during the swimming and cycling portions of the race, Silence Suzuka pulled farther ahead.
However, the long distance run at the end-

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: We're finally at the Triathalon's finale! Silence Suzuka-san is still in the lead!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: However! Since she's been running full speed until now, she's greatly slowed down! The followers are catching up!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Haa… haa… ku…!
From the goal, I can see Silence Suzuka's form approaching, but-

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: As I thought, she must not have enough stamina left…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey, our voices might reach her from here, let's cheer her on! You can do it, Suzuka-senpai!
This Triathalon is just a part of training, an unimportant event- but still…
I didn't know if my voice would reach her, but I still cheered as loud as I could.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: This scenery…I won't yield it to anyone!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Oh! Silence Suzuka-san once again increases her speed!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: The others can't catch up! She's completely running away!

text_block_list.name: Announcer Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: And just like that she keeps her lead, now - GOAL! The Triathalon's winner is Silence Suzuka-san!

text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOA!!!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The shaved ice was delicious. It tastes so much better after moving my body to the fullest.
choice_data_list: Even more so, since you won.
Even more so, since you won.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Even if it was a Triathalon, I still didn't want to give the lead to anyone… But since that's such a difficult thing to do, I wasn't planning on entering.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, just like the Meetup event, instead of thinking too hard about it, why not just simply run the way I want… that's what I was thinking.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The reason I'm able to think like this, is because of you, Trainer-san.
choice_data_list: Participating was a good call, huh?
Participating was a good call, huh?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes…Also, I've figured one more thing out.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A place so quiet that I could only hear the wind and my beating heart, a world just for me… that was the most important scenery to me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …however, that's changed just a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: With nobody else around, the only thing I see infront of me is Trainer-san

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: At the end, that was the scenery that pulled me forward.
choice_data_list: From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal
From here on, I'll be waiting at the goal

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No matter the race, I will definitely lead and return to Trainer-san's side.
Throughout this training camp, Silence Suzuka had not only improved her abilities, but had also grown enough to express her feelings.
